item.title: Srry but please help me..again
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

yes, my max stats are 99, but my max combat is 185 if i have 99 atk/str/def/hp/mage/range/ and prayer and all the combat stats.

-kyle[br][size=1]Posted on: October 04, 2007, 02:16:09 PM[/size][hr]so can anyone help me…[br][size=1]Posted on: October 04, 2007, 02:20:43 PM[/size][hr]please, if anyone can help ill make them admin on my server…[br][size=1]Posted on: October 04, 2007, 02:26:04 PM[/size][hr]FFS PLEASE HELP!!![br][size=1]Posted on: October 04, 2007, 02:46:29 PM[/size][hr]please…i beg of help!

item.title: Srry but please help me..again
item.dc:creator: @M_i_K_e M,i,K,e
item.description:
@M_i_K_e wrote:

The stats control the combat… Usual on servers;
135 = 253 Combat.
120 = 206
100 = 127
99 = 126.

-M,i,k,e

item.title: Srry but please help me..again
item.dc:creator: @M_i_K_e M,i,K,e
item.description:
@M_i_K_e wrote:

Actually whats the stat? Look for: for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 00; lvl++) {
Where the 00 is put the stat that is on your server, where all the main stats are, then look for it, then change it to 99 then goto ‘return 00;’ same change the 00 into the stat you want, from the other.

-M,i,k,e

Read full topic

99999

Search that in your client. When you find it. Change it to.

14000000
